text: Alaha di kitaba vica mahini'am di ginati alaha de nere baram hai. Usa dina tom jadom alaha ne asamanam ate dharati nu paida kita. Unham vicom cara mahine pavitarata vale hana. Iha hi sidha raha hai. Isa la'i inham mahini'am vica apane apa upara zulama na karom ate butaparasati karana vali'am nala sare ikathe ho ke yudha karo. Jisa tar'ham uha sare ikathe ho ke tuhade nala larade hana, samajha lavo ki raba bhai'a ate sajama rakhana vali'am de nala hai
